title: Merge DNA
subtitle: Upload 1 or 2 DNA files to convert or merge

privacy.title: Your Privacy is Protected:
privacy.message: All DNA file processing happens entirely in your browser on your computer. No data is uploaded to any server. Your genetic information never leaves your device.

options.prefer_source: Prefer data source in case of conflicts:
options.tooltip_prefer: When both tests show different values for the same genetic marker (e.g., one shows 'AT' and the other shows 'GG'), use the result from this source.
options.tooltip_fill: When enabled, fills gaps in one test with real data from the other test. When disabled, strictly follows your preferred source even if it has missing values (-- or 00).
